item.name: db_connection_failed
item.message: The connection to the database failed

item.name: disclaimer
item.message: Despite careful contentwise control we do not take over adhesion for contents of external hyperlinks. Exclusively the operators are responsible for the contents of the of the linked pages.

item.name: installation_error
item.message:
During the installation an error has occured, whereby the installation can\'t continue. Please check all petitions again, especially, wether all statements inside the configuration file are right.
Please click on the "Back"-button, to go back to the start of the installation process.

item.name: installation_successful_1
item.message:
All queries has been executed successfully, whereby the installation is now finished.
By the following button you can reach the frontend of your website. Afterwards you can log in and do further changes to your site, eg. changing the language, choosing an other design or publishing content.

item.name: installation_successful_2
item.message: Attention: Please delete the "installation"-folder, because it\'s a possible security risk, if this folders exists in a production environment.

item.name: news_text
item.message:
It looks like that the installation of the ACP3 4.0 was successful.
This is only a Testnews, which you can now edit or delete inside the administration area.
Apart from that, the Goratsch Webdesign Team wishes you much fun with the ACP3 4.0!

item.name: offline_message
item.message: This website is currently offline. Please try it in a few minutes again.

item.name: step_1_legend
item.message: In detail, the installer will guide you through the following steps:

item.name: step_1_list_item_2
item.message: Checking the server configuration, wether all requirements are accomplished

item.name: step_1_list_item_3
item.message: Input of the basic parameters for your site

item.name: step_1_list_item_4
item.message: Writing the tables into the database

item.name: step_1_paragraph_1
item.message: Welcome to the installation of the ACP3. This assistant will guide you through the hole installation process, so that you can successfully install this web content management system.

item.name: step_3_paragraph_1
item.message: These requirements have to be fulfilled, otherwise you can\'t install the ACP3 successfully. Additionally we check, wether the correct CHMOD for certain files and folders is set.

item.name: step_3_paragraph_2
item.message: Here we check the PHP settings of your webspace/server, which shouldn\'t be relevant to successfully install the ACP3. If one field is displayed in red, please contact your hosting provider to solve this problem.

item.name: stop_installation
item.message: The installation can\'t continue, because your webspace/server doesn\'t fulfill the requirements.

item.name: type_in_db_host
item.message: Please type in the hostname, which belongs to the database

item.name: type_in_db_name
item.message: Please type in the database name

item.name: type_in_db_username
item.message: Please type in the user name for the database

item.name: type_in_pwd
item.message: Either the password is empty or in the repetition of the password is a typo

item.name: type_in_user_name
item.message: Please type in an user name for the administrator account

item.name: wrong_chmod_for_config_file
item.message: Please set the CHMOD for the config.php, which is located in the "includes"-folder, to 777
